sgrpt.description: The number of (S, G, rpt) route.

state-statistics.description:
IPv6 mroute state statistics information:
Ind-Pim Include macro,
Exd-Pim Exclude macro, 
Jns-Pim Joins macro,
LAst-Pim Lost_assert macro, 
Imo-Pim Immediate_olist macro,
Ino-Pim Inherited_olist macro, 
Lcd-Pim Local_receiver_include macro,
Fbk-Fallback_extranet_receiver_number.

Ind-Pim Include macro,

Ino-Pim Inherited_olist macro, 
Lcd-Pim Local_receiver_include macro.

fallback-vrf.description: The upstream VRF name of mroute.

oif-macro.description:
Outcoming interface macro information:
LocalIn-Local include join,
AstW-Assert winner state,
AstL-Assert loser state,
LostAst-LostAssert macro,
ImoXG-ImmediateOlist XG macro,
Bidir-RPF-Bidir RPF RP macro,
JoinsSG-Pim JoinsSG Macro,
PrunesSGRpt-PrunesSGRpt macro,
LocalInSG-Local include join SG,
LocalExSG-Local exclude join SG,
AstWSG-Assert winner SG state,
AstLSG-Assert loser SG state,
LostAstSG-LostAssert SG macro,
LostAstSGRpt-LostAssert SG-RPT macro,
InheritedFromXG-ImmediateOlistXG macro,
InoSGRpt-InheritedOlistSGRpt macro,
InoSG-InheritedOlistSG macro,
DenseAstWSG-PIM-DM assert winner state,
DenseAstLSG-PIM-DM lost assert SG state,
DensePruneSG-PIM-DM pruned state,
DenseLostAst-PIM-DM lost assert SG macro,
DenseOlist-PIM-DM OlistSG macro.

state-statistics.description:
IPv6 mroute state statistics information:
Ind-Pim Include macro,
Exd-Pim Exclude macro, 
Jns-Pim Joins macro,
LAst-Pim Lost_assert macro, 
Imo-Pim Immediate_olist macro,
Ino-Pim Inherited_olist macro, 
Lcd-Pim Local_receiver_include macro, 
Fbk-Fallback_extranet_receiver_number.

sg-rpt-upstream-state.description: SG-RPT upstream state information, "RPT NOT JOINED","PRUNED","NOT PRUNED".

sg-rpt-state-statistics.description:
SG-RPT state statistics information:
Ind-Pim Include macro,
Exd-Pim Exclude macro, 
Jns-Pim Joins macro,
LAst-Pim Lost_assert macro, 
Imo-Pim Immediate_olist macro,
Ino-Pim Inherited_olist macro, 
Lcd-Pim Local_receiver_include macro.

fallback-vrf.description: The upstream instance name of mroute.If the instance of upstream is public, the value of the node is IP global, else is VRF name.

oif-macro.description:
Outcoming interface macro information:
LocalIn-Local include join,
AstW-Assert winner state,
AstL-Assert loser state,
LostAst-LostAssert macro,
ImoXG-ImmediateOlist XG macro,
Bidir-RPF-Bidir RPF RP macro,
JoinsSG-Pim JoinsSG Macro,
PrunesSGRpt-PrunesSGRpt macro,
LocalInSG-Local include join SG,
LocalExSG-Local exclude join SG,
AstWSG-Assert winner SG state,
AstLSG-Assert loser SG state,
LostAstSG-LostAssert SG macro,
LostAstSGRpt-LostAssert SG-RPT macro,
InheritedFromXG-ImmediateOlistXG macro,
InoSGRpt-InheritedOlistSGRpt macro,
InoSG-InheritedOlistSG macro,
DenseAstWSG-PIM-DM assert winner state,
DenseAstLSG-PIM-DM lost assert SG state,
DensePruneSG-PIM-DM pruned state,
DenseLostAst-PIM-DM lost assert SG macro,
DenseOlist-PIM-DM OlistSG macro.
